Ministry: Ministry of Govt of Maharashtra Department: Industries, Energy and Labour Department Type: STATE Location: Maharashtra TitleFiles TitleFiles TitleFiles TitleFiles Show all section The Maharashtra Shops and Establishments (Regulation of Employment and Conditions of Service) Act, 2017 CHAPTER I PRELIMINARY CHAPTER II REGISTRATION OF ESTABLISHMENTS CHAPTER III OPENING AND CLOSING HOURS, HOURS OF WORK, INTERVAL FOR REST, SPREAD-OVER, WAGES FOR OVERTIME AND WEEKLY OFF CHAPTER IV LEAVE WITH PAY AND PAYMENT OF WAGES CHAPTER V WELFARE PROVISIONS CHAPTER VI ENFORCEMENT AND INSPECTION CHAPTER VII OFFENCES AND PENALTIES CHAPTER VIII MISCELLANEOUS Section 1. Short title, extent, application and commencement. Section 2. Definitions. Section 3. Act not to apply to certain establishments and persons. Section 4. Application of Act to other establishments and workers. Section 5. Suspension of all or any of provisions of this Act. Section 6. Registration of establishments. Section 7. Intimation of establishment employing less than ten workers. Section 8. Cancellation of registration. Section 9. Change to be communicated to Facilitator. Section 10. Closing of establishment to be communicated to Facilitator. Section 11. Opening and closing hours of establishment. Section 12. Daily and weekly hours of work in establishment and interval for rest. Section 13. Prohibition of discrimination against woman worker. Section 14. Spread-over in establishments. Section 15. Wages for overtime. Section 16. Weekly holiday for worker. Section 17. Employer to furnish identity card to worker. Section 18. Leave. Section 19. Health and safety of workers. Section 20. First-aid. Section 21. Drinking water. Section 22. Latrines and urinals. Section 23. Creche facility. Section 24. Canteen. Section 25. Maintenance of registers and records. Section 26. Annual Return. Section 27. Provisions for handing over enforcement of Act to local authorities. Section 28. Appointment of Chief Facilitator and Facilitators and their powers. Section 29. Penalty for contravention of provisions of this Act. Section 30. Penalty for contravention of provisions of this Act which resulted in accident. Section 31. Penalty for obstructions or refusal to provide register, etc. Section 32. Cognizance of offences. Section 33. Compounding of offences. Section 34. Power to exempt. Section 35. Rights and privileges under other laws etc., not affected. Section 36. Protection of action taken in good faith. Section 36A. Name Board to be in Marathi. Section 37. Power to make Rules. Section 38. Power to remove difficulties. Section 39. Repeal of Maharashtra Shops and Establishments Act.
